battery: Lithium-ion LP-E6, Approx. 1100 (at 23°C, AE 50%, FE 50%), Approx. 1000 (at 0°C, AE 50%, FE 50%)AC Adapter Kit ACK-E6, Battery charger LC-E6, Car Battery charger CBC-E6
